99904 boyad kayd kard , ki kuvvai zexny va cismonii cavononi mo az xamtoxoi xoricii xud xec farke nadorand .
99905 vatan on cost , ki tu xudro ozod xis mekuni , vatan on cost , ki tu baroi zindagii xubat rozi xasti conatro fido kuni !
99906 oe onxo bo xukumat problema nadorand ,?
99907 kadri zara zargar medonad meguyand barodaron .
99909 caro nikoxat ba zaboni tociki ast ?
99913 iltimos , xamcun mard posux dixed .
99918 zero avvalan siyosati kadrxo nodurust ast , duvvuman maoS nociz ast va sevvuman taYlimu tarbiyai drurust oidi nafaroni makomot durust ba rox monda naSudaast .
99920 yo zud ast , ki cun aral xuSk Savad .
99921 aknun ba caSmi " cekist " ci xel nigax mekarda boSand ?
99927 to xolo xam xukumatdoroni mo fakat vaYda mekunandu , xalos .
99930 nom : muxammadsodik az : moskva istikloliyat yaRne ozod budan dar xonai xud dar vatani xud .
99933 in nerugoxro mo boyad xatman bisozem va xatman onro bo sifati baland ba itmom rasonem .
99940 ba fikri man in Sirkat dodari xamin meboSad , zero dar somonaaS gayr az yak du fakra bo du unvon digar cize nest .
99943 xayr ba xar xol mexoxam ki raxo Savad , caro ki ba duSmani xud namexoxam maxbasro .
99944 fikr namekunam , ki dustoni ironi in nuktaro nafaxmida boSand .
99949 yak masYalai digar , xama vazoratu korxonaxo saxifaxoi aslii somonaxoi xudro ba zaboni rusi mondaand , na ba zaboni tociki .
99958 vagar ne , tagi ob memonem .
99967 ki vaziri boytarin va ki fakirtarin ?
99969 nom : Sedfar az : moskva banda kardiologam dar maskav .
99970 man tarafdoraS nestam , ammo uro xamcun yak siyosatmadore ki tamomi caxon xamcun raisi cumxur meSinoxt xurmataS mekunam .
99971 mulloxoi mo az xamon kozikalonaS sar karda to digaru digaraS naYlatbiyori igvoandoz !
99972 xar yak oilaro bo xonaixozira zamon taYmin mesoxtam va kuSiS menamudam .
99974 xayr firuzcon dozai xudut balandi bad budaast .
99977 tamoSoi in aks maro ba ruzxoi guzaStai 20 - 25 peS bur ki , xargiz digar bar namegardand .
99979 nom : camila az : duSanbe tu maro xub meSinosi , 20 aprel bo xam to istanbul parvoz doStem , ammo mo bo tu cand sol dar yak muassisae kor mekardem .
99980 tu dodar dori yo nadori ?
99983 xoxiS mekardem ki cunin farmonxo ( SarxaSon ) dar ruznomai " cumxuriyat " ki organi Suroi oli ba xisob meravad ba cop rasand .
99984 ba xar xol insof va imon bar dasti onxost .
99989 bined digar davlatxoi xamsoya taraki karda istodaand , zero dar on davlatxo kafolat oidi investiRiyai xorici xast .
99990 xar kas xar ci menavisad , lekin fikr namekunad , ki 600 oila ba xisobi miyona 3 - nafari yaYne 6003 = 1800 nafar be xona memonad .
99996 ba guftaxoi akai tolibSo muvofikam .
99998 cunki dar in co yagon kas be icozati mudved sar bolo karda nametavonad !
